sentences.english: Our team wore red and white shirts, white shorts and red stockings.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊身穿紅白上衣，白色短褲和紅色長襪。

sentences.english: The gold landed in their stockings drying beside the fireplace.
sentences.chinese: 這些金子掉入她們掛在壁爐烘乾的長襪中。

sentences.english: How else could you hold up your nylons ?
sentences.chinese: 除了這樣你還怎麼辦才能提住你的的尼龍長襪？

sentences.english: On Christmas Eve I hung up my stocking along with my sisters.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節前夜，我跟姐姐們一起把長襪掛了起來。

sentences.english: Some people even put up stockings for their pets aswell.
sentences.chinese: 一些人甚至也爲他們的寵物掛起聖誕長襪。

sentences.english: She wore a pair of stockings.
Her stocking had a ladder in it.
sentences.chinese: 她的長襪有一道抽絲痕。

sentences.english: What concepts are you trying to explore with Pippi Longstocking?
sentences.chinese: 你通過《長襪子皮皮》這個故事想表達什麼理念？

sentences.english: Two stockings were hanging over the back of the chair.
One is Hanna putting on her stockings in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 一個是漢娜在廚房穿長襪的記憶。

sentences.english: On Christmas Eve the children hang their stockings at the foot of the bed.
sentences.chinese: 平安夜孩子們將長襪掛在牀腳頭旁邊。

sentences.english: I did not ask her who Pippi Longstocking was.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有問她誰是長襪子皮皮。

sentences.english: Wearing panty hose while swimming is also a good prevention measure since it can prevent jellies from being able to harm your legs.
sentences.chinese: 在游泳的時候穿上女式長襪能避免你的腿部被襲擊。

definition: fitting one's feet (of shoes or socks)
